title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: The process of updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature is taking a long time, around 30 seconds in my case. During this process, a busy cursor should be displayed to indicate that the system is busy. Not displaying the busy cursor makes it difficult for users to understand the progress of the operation.
OB: The updated state of checkboxes should be reflected in a timely manner when using the Export Zip feature.
EB: A busy cursor should be displayed during the updating process of the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature.
SR: Improve the efficiency of updating checkboxes and display a busy cursor to provide visual feedback to the user during the process.
